name: Casino Video Poker (hypnotic)
description:
Casino Video Poker is based on the classic and popular five-card draw poker as played on slot machine sized consoles in casinos all over the world.

The game was made over a 48 hour period as a fun hobbie side-project. It is my first card game and it was very educational to research and learn what it takes to make a poker game like this. I will take what I have learnt into future projects.

I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I have making it. :)
